message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its immense value to you, I propose a price of $1,200,000 for the product. This offer takes into account the significant worth of the product to you and aims to ensure a fair transaction for both parties. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.
